section.title: Plastic Packaging Solutions for Industry
section.description: From film packaging to custom rotogravure printing, we provide packaging solutions built for your operations.

items.title: Film Packaging & Slitting
items.description: Precision resizing of film material into custom widths and diameters for your specific applications.
items.detailDescription: We offer high-precision slitting and rewinding services to convert master rolls into smaller sizes that fit your exact machinery requirements. Our advanced equipment ensures clean cuts and perfectly wound rolls.
features: Wide range of core sizes available

items.title: Industrial Plastic Packaging
items.description: High-durability plastic packaging materials designed to protect your goods during storage and distribution.
items.detailDescription: Our industrial plastic packaging solutions are engineered for strength, stability, and consistent quality. Suitable for retail, distribution, and high-volume manufacturing operations.

items.title: Custom Rotogravure Printing
items.description: High-precision rotogravure printing for consistent branding and product information on packaging.
items.detailDescription: Our rotogravure printing service delivers sharp print detail, stable batch output, and alignment with your packaging design specifications.

items.title: Contract Manufacturing
items.description: Reliable toll manufacturing services to expand your production capacity without major capital investment.
items.detailDescription: Leverage our manufacturing expertise and facilities to produce your packaging products. We act as your production partner, ensuring high quality and timely delivery under your brand.
